General.Name: RYU Apparel Inc
General.Description: RYU Apparel Inc. develops, markets, and distributes athletic apparel, bags, and accessories under the RYU brand for men and women in Canada and the United States. It offers men's and women's apparel; bags; and accessories for fitness, training, and performance of athlete. The company sells its products through its retail stores and wholesale accounts, as well as ryu.com and ryu.com an e-commerce site. RYU Apparel Inc. was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
